name: WordGuessing
0:
”Alexa, open word guessing”
”Alexa play word guessing”
”Alexa run word guessing”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: word guessing
Developer Terms of Use
des: Welcome to our exciting word guessing game! Test your vocabulary and wit as you immerse yourself in a fun-filled challenge. With a wide variety of categories, from countries and cities to professions and animals, you'll have the chance to show off your language skills. Each round will challenge you to unscramble a hidden word within the chosen category. Ask for clues, suggest letters and guess the word before you run out of chances. Get ready for hours of entertainment as you compete alone or with friends to see who can discover the most words!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
